About Me

Let me tell you about myself...

Sam Moschler

Hey! I'm Sam, and I run Cobo Designs LLC. I've been doing graphic design work for over 10 years, and web design for almost 5. Front-end web development has become my passion, and makes working not feel like work! I also do on-call design work for multiple promotional companies.

I've got 2 beautiful kids, and an even more beautiful wife - and they're the reason I do what I do.
